* [Home](https://westonlakestexas.gov/)
* [City Government](https://westonlakestexas.gov/city-government/)











The City of Weston Lakes, Texas is a Type B General Law Municipality. The elected officials include the Mayor and City Council. The appointed officials consist of the Emergency Management Coordinator and the City Secretary. The Mayor serves as the Chief Executive Officer and is elected by the Citizens. The Mayor is responsible for managing all personnel, except where City Ordinances, Resolutions or Policies provide otherwise.  At this time the City only has one part-time employee (the City Secretary).
